books.title: Don't Belive It
books.author: Charlie Donlea
books.description: A young docu-series maker (Sidney) takes interest in the case of a young woman (Grace) that was convicted of killing her boyfiend on spring break. Sidney hopes that making the series will prove Grace's innocence and get her released from the foreign jail. The audience believes Grace is innocent...is she?
books.opinion: It was extremely predictable. I knew how it was going to end 3/4 of the way through the book.
